p: Specific warnings and precautions of use. In the case of treatment with anticoagulants, antacids, corticosteroids, or NSAIDs, the use of salix should be avoided ( EMA, 2017d). Do not use it in people with gastrointestinal disorders and sensitivity to salicylic acid ( BRASIL, 2011). Overall, due to the antiplatelet effect, in the context of COVID-19, the safety should be considered Medium.
